faqs.question: How does the 6-month full-stack program work?
faqs.answer: Our program is divided into two 3-month segments: frontend development followed by backend development. Each segment includes video lessons, coding exercises, projects, and mentorship.

faqs.question: What payment options do you offer?
faqs.answer: We offer monthly payment plans, one-time payment discounts, and scholarship opportunities for exceptional candidates. All major credit cards and PayPal are accepted.

faqs.question: Will I receive a certificate after completion?
faqs.answer: Yes, you'll receive a certificate of completion after finishing each segment (frontend and backend) and a comprehensive full-stack developer certificate after completing both.

faqs.question: What if I fall behind during the program?
faqs.answer: We offer flexible scheduling and extended access to materials. You can also schedule 1:1 sessions with instructors to catch up. Our goal is your success!

faqs.question: Do you offer job placement assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes! We provide resume reviews, portfolio building, interview preparation, and connections to our hiring partners. Many of our graduates have secured positions at top tech companies.

faqs.question: What frontend technologies will I learn in the 3-month program?
faqs.answer: Our frontend program covers HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+), React.js, and modern tools like Webpack and Babel. You'll also learn responsive design principles and CSS frameworks like Tailwind CSS.

faqs.question: Do I need any prior coding experience for the frontend course?
faqs.answer: No prior experience is required. We start from the absolute basics and gradually progress to advanced concepts. However, familiarity with computers and basic logic will be helpful.

faqs.question: How much time should I dedicate daily to the frontend program?
faqs.answer: We recommend dedicating 2-3 hours daily for optimal progress. This includes video lessons, coding exercises, and project work. The program is designed to be intensive but manageable.

faqs.question: Will I build real projects during the frontend course?
faqs.answer: Yes! You'll build 5+ portfolio-worthy projects including a responsive e-commerce site, a React dashboard application, and a modern single-page application with API integration.

faqs.question: What kind of support will I get during the frontend program?
faqs.answer: You'll have access to weekly live Q&A sessions, a dedicated Slack channel with instructors, code reviews, and 24/7 forum support. We also provide career guidance and interview preparation.

faqs.question: What backend technologies are covered in the 3-month program?
faqs.answer: Our backend curriculum includes Node.js, Express.js, databases (SQL & MongoDB), RESTful APIs, authentication (JWT, OAuth), and deployment. You'll also learn about Docker and cloud services.

faqs.question: Should I complete the frontend program before starting backend?
faqs.answer: While it's recommended to have basic frontend knowledge, it's not mandatory. We provide all necessary foundational concepts at the beginning of the backend program.

faqs.question: Will I learn about databases in the backend course?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! You'll work with both SQL (PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB) databases, learn about data modeling, queries, and ORMs like Sequelize and Mongoose.

faqs.question: How is the backend program different from the frontend program?
faqs.answer: While frontend focuses on user interfaces, the backend program dives into server-side development, APIs, databases, authentication, and deployment. You'll build robust server applications.

faqs.question: What kind of projects will I build in the backend program?
faqs.answer: You'll create 4-5 substantial projects including a REST API service, a full-stack application with authentication, a real-time chat application, and a microservices architecture project.
